title: Possible Ban
body:
3/11/17 at 0215 I was playing a normal 5v5. 3 mins in we have a power outage. I can't get back on and I'll be reported. Is their anyway I will not be banned..... this game is everything to me.

I can upload photos of the council working on the power

replies.body: A single disconnect will not result in any punishment. Even if it happens often (which it shouldn't) the only punishment you ought to receive is a LeaverBuster.
